column2: "Hm... Come to think of it, the native species on the Tundra are far stronger than those in the Forest."
"This may be a tough one, even for you, so don't overdo it. Of course, if you blow this one, I'll have to start calling you Newbie again."
"Oh, it's a little pathetic to relapse in just one go... right? Whatever it is, just give it your all!"
